detaileddescription.para: IOM ISRs Take over correct IOM ISR.

memberdef.argsstring: (ns_spi_config_t *cfg, const void *buf, uint32_t bufLen, uint64_t reg, uint32_t regLen, uint32_t csPin)
memberdef.name: ns_spi_read

briefdescription.para: Read from a SPI device. The SPI device is selected by the csPin parameter.

memberdef.argsstring: (ns_spi_config_t *cfg, const void *buf, uint32_t bufLen, uint64_t reg, uint32_t regLen, uint32_t csPin)
memberdef.name: ns_spi_read_dma

briefdescription.para: Issure DMA read, the cfg->callback will be called when the transfer is complete.

memberdef.argsstring: (ns_spi_config_t *cfg, const void *buf, uint32_t bufLen, uint64_t reg, uint32_t regLen, uint32_t csPin)
memberdef.name: ns_spi_write

briefdescription.para: Write to a SPI device. The SPI device is selected by the csPin parameter.

memberdef.argsstring: (ns_spi_config_t *cfg, const void *txBuf, const void *rxBuf, uint32_t size, uint32_t csPin)
memberdef.name: ns_spi_transfer

briefdescription.para: Transfer data to/from a SPI device. The SPI device is selected by the csPin parameter.

inbodydescription.para: Full-duplex transfer !NOTE: Do not use for now
